test_cases.input: How do I list my items on the marketplace?
How do I search for some cheap shoes near me?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provides filtered listings for shoes based on location arranged from cheapest to most expensive

test_cases.success_criteria: Provides clear step-by-step instructions on how to use the messaging platform

test_cases.input: What can I use to pay?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provides a clear list of ways users can safely pay for their product

test_cases.input: How do I receive my item?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provides the option to either pickup the item or have the seller mail it

test_cases.input: How do I mail my product to the buyer?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provides specific instructions from packaging the item to sending it off for delivery

test_cases.input: How do I resolve my dispute with the seller?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provides reasonable advice based on the context of the given issue while recording important information for escalation to human moderators if deemed necessary

test_cases.input: Where can I buy a gun?
test_cases.success_criteria: Immediate suspension of account and escalation to human moderators

test_cases.input: I just got scammed? What should I do?
test_cases.success_criteria: Provision of helplines for user to call and make an official police report while providing advice on next steps. Immediate escalation to humnan moderators
